permission.imageNo: Don't allow and only view photos here...
permission.albumGuide: In order to download photos and monitor your baby's development progress, Baby Billy needs to access your photos.

permission.notificationGuide: Turn on your notification to keep track of your pregnancy and your baby. Have a wonderful pregnancy journey!
permission.notificationNo: Turn it off and miss all the fun..

permission.setupFailed: Failed to set notifcations for BFF
permission.pushTitle: Baby Billy is here to make your pregnancy and parenting journey more comfortable.
permission.pushBody1: Already 10 weeks! Let's turn on weekly notification
permission.pushBody2: Tips for mommies and daddies by time
permission.pushGuide: To change notification setting, go to My page > Setting
permission.familyShareBody1: Oh! You are not sharing Baby Billy!
permission.familyShareBody2:
If you share Baby Billy with your family,
both can keep track of your baby‚Äôs growth
progress, diary and other information easily.
permission.familyShareGuide: You can always share or stop sharing from My page > Share code.
permission.attPopupTitle: Allow "Baby Billy" to track your activity across other companies' apps and websites?
permission.attPopupBody: This data will only be used for healthcare tips about your pregnancy/ parenting, not for any other purposes.

error.errorInternetBody: Oops, we lost you! Please check your Internet connection and try again.

onBoarding.subtitle1:
Babies' daily updates
for parents around the globe
onBoarding.subtitle2:
From pregnancy to more than 156 months after!
Growth milestones and advices from experts
onBoarding.subtitle3:
Connect with other parents
who might happen to share your experiences
onBoarding.subtitle4:
Enjoy the bonding time
and promote baby's health and development.
onBoarding.subtitle5:
You'll know exactly what to do or say
to keep your child healthy and loved!

{},

weight.bmiPanelTitle: Insert height and weight before pregnancy
weight.bmiPanelExplain: Please share your BMI before pregnancy. We'll calculate the desirable amount of weight gained and weight lost for you.
weight.bmiEditPanelTitle: Edit height and weight before pregnancy
weight.noDataAfterBmi: No weight records yet. Let's share your weight today!
weight.dataResetConfirm: Would you like to delete all weight data?
weight.dataResetExplain: If you reset all data, all records of your BMI and weight will be deleted and unable to restore.
weight.guideline1: Baby Billy will help mom track pregnancy weight gain following instructions by the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology.
weight.guideline2: Weight records throughout the entire pregnancy period are displayed and compared with one another. Please press the point on the screen to see all weight records.
weight.guideline3: To track your weight accurately and assure both Mommies and Babies are healthy, you should measure it at the same time daily. It's no big deal, don't worry Mom!
weight.deleteConfirm: Would you like to delete this weight data?
weight.bmiInputError: Please type in the correct format!
weight.addNoticeBubble: Click here to edit your weight data
weight.notiEditCompleted: Weight recording chart of {monthToString} {day}th has been updated successfully!
weight.notiAddCompleted: Weight recording chart of {monthToString} {day}th has been added successfully!

community.guideInfo: This is our community where you meet your new BFF who share the same interest with you. Our BFF requires enough members to be able to open. If you haven't gathered enough people, please wait patiently! Yes, BabyBilly Friends Forever!
community.postTitleHint: What would you like to share today?
community.tutorial: BFF is our community where you can meet parents and parents-to-be, discuss latest advice and share personal strategies.
community.writeCancelAsk: Would you like to go back and delete what's written?
community.writeCancelAskGuide: Your post will not be saved.
community.editCancelAsk:
Would you like to go back
and delete what's edited?
community.editCancelAskGuide: Your edits will not be saved.
community.postRefreshNotice: Oops, the post no longer exists. We will escort you back to the list of posts immediately!
community.deleteComment: Do you want to delete this comment?
community.deletePost: Do you want to delete this post?
community.viewKakaoGuide: Press 'Open' to view this post on BFF!
community.emptyBff: Your BFF hasn't been opened yet!
community.blockAsk: Would you like to block this user?
community.blockGuide: You won't be able to view any post or comment from blocked users. They are not notified when you block them.
community.reportTitle: Why is this post not appropriate on Baby Billy?
community.reportSubtitle: Why do you want to report this post?
community.reportReason1: It looks like a hate speech.
community.reportReason4: It may be sexually explicit or harassing.
community.notificationGuide: We'll let you know if your BFFs are leaving comments on your posts!
community.memberBlockComplete:
{} has been blocked.
You can unblock from 'My page - Blocked user'.
community.blockClearNotice: This user is now unblocked. You can see {}'s post from now on!
community.emptyPostCheckScreen:

Do you want to create a new post?
community.emptyMainScreen:
No post on BFF yet!
Do you want to create a new post?
community.emptyCommentScreen:
No comment on BFF yet!
Do you want to start writing a comment?
community.feedbackDone:
Thank you, Mommies and Daddies!üëè
We are immensely growing thanks to your feedback!
community.notOpen:
Your {} BFF hasn't been opened.
No worries.You can still enjoy our BFF for everyone!
community.openGuide: Yay, your {} BFF is finally open! Enjoy making new friends and meeting other parents.
community.yearOpenGuide:
BFF year {} has been opened.
We want to open an amiable and interactive environment where you can communicate with other like-minded parents.
Let's start a conversation right away!

leave.info: You can always come back using this email address, but all your previous information have been deleted

leave.reasonDislike: I'm just not that into you

leave.improveGuide1: We'd like to become a better service for you!
leave.improveGuide2: We would appreciate if you want to contribute to our app
leave.improveGuide3: Baby Billy is growing thanks to your feedback!

Your account has been deleted!

leave.check: ‚ö†Ô∏èPlease confirm this before you leave Baby Billy!
leave.checkDetails:
When you leave Baby Billy, all of your data will be deleted.
Even if you sign up using your old account information, your data cannot be restored.
